vista.report

Class ReportUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • vista.report.ReportUtils

  • public class ReportUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utility functions for writing out text aligned in columns of a line.

                           int[] columns,
                           java.lang.String[] strs,
                           int[] justifications,
                           javax.swing.text.Style[] styles)
        1. Does not write out null strings 2. Does not write out string if space is not sufficient.

      • addString

        public static void addString(javax.swing.text.Document doc,
                             int offset,
                             java.lang.String str,
                             javax.swing.text.Style s)
        This method checks to make sure the doc and string are non-null and then inserts the string to the end of the document after pushing offset number of spaces and in the given style.

      • space

        public static java.lang.String space(int number)
        makes a string with the given number of characters using the the current filler character. Its a bit more efficient than using repeat

      • repeat
